EmailTemplate.description: After users have completed the kit order process
EmailTemplate.name: Beta_Order Confirmation v2
EmailTemplate.subject: Helix Order Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Helix Order Confirmation
Order Confirmation
Thank you for completing your Helix Beta order.
Your saliva sample collection kit should arrive within 5-7 days. Please do not share your kit with others. Thanks again for your participation in the Helix Beta program. If you have any questions, please email us at beta@helix.com.
Cheers,
The Helix Team
Contact us if you have any questions: beta@helix.com
